ThingDef.label: dual eraser
ThingDef.description: A pair of rapid fire machine pistols in form of two compact twin erasers with huge magazines for dual wielding purposes. The immense firepower like its multi shot comes at the price of low precision. Found on high criminal Urbworlds, where narrow alleys are present. Can be mounted on cybernetics for faster reloads on close up targets.\n\nMade for Akimbo.

ThingDef.label: accelerator
ThingDef.description: A heavy cybernetic weapon system. The inner coils of this monstrum are switched on and off in a precisely timed sequence, causing the hybrid projectiles to be accelerated quickly along the barrel via magnetic forces. Swaps between ammunition on toggle.

ThingDef.label: Plasma gun
ThingDef.description: A heavy cybernetic weapon system. The coils of this monstrum are switched on and off in a precisely timed sequence, causing the micro explosion projectiles to be accelerated quickly along the barrel via magnetic forces. Designed to destroy light vehicles and aircraft with its superior firepower.

ThingDef.label: coil gun
ThingDef.description: A heavy projectile accelerator consisting of one coil used as electromagnet in the configuration of a linear motor that accelerates a ferromagnetic or conducting projectile to high velocity, resulting in uncomparable armor penetration. Designed to destroy light vehicles and aircraft with its superior firepower.

ThingDef.label: ballistic enforcer
ThingDef.description: An energy assisted assault rifle for field operations. This version is integrated with a computing system to increase its firepower and accuracy. The energy infused projectiles are fired in small bursts to prevent overheating.
